descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Cade Cunningham gathers the rock on the fast break and throws down the dunk for the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham skies for big jam) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham throws down the one-handed jam on the fast break

videos.description: Hamidou Diallo gets the steal and slams home a massive jam to extend the Pistons' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hamidou Diallo makes a great defensive play for the steal) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hamidou Diallo gets it done on both ends of the floor

videos.description: Hamidou Diallo gathers the ball on the fast break and rocks the rim with a massive dunk to extend the Pistons' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Hamidou Diallo skies for big dunk) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Hamidou Diallo throws it down with authority

videos.description: Cade Cunningham gathers the dime from Trey Lyles as he drives to the basket and finishes with the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trey Lyles makes beautiful dime for a basket) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lyles dimes Cunningham for the and-1 bucket

videos.description: Chris Boucher posts up his defender and knocks down the and-1 for the Raptors.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Chris Boucher gets the and-1 to fall) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Chris Boucher turns around and drains the and-1

videos.description: Trey Lyles drives into the paint and powers past his defender to drain the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trey Lyles gets the basket plus the foul) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trey Lyles muscles through his defender and gets the and-1 to fall

videos.description: Trey Lyles won't be denied as he maneuvers past two defenders to get the and-1 to fall.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Trey Lyles gets the hoop and the harm) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Trey Lyles powers past two defenders to knock down the and-1 bucket

videos.description: Pascal Siakam muscles through his defender and gets the and-1 to fall for the Raptors.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Pascal Siakam gets the and-1 to fall) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pascal Siakam won't be denied as he drains the and-1

videos.description: Killian Hayes drives to the basket and throws down the dunk to extend the Pistons' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Killian Hayes rocks the rim with powerful jam) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Killian Hayes elevates for the two-handed jam

videos.description: Cory Joseph crosses his defender and knocks down the step-back jumper for the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cory Joseph makes the nice jump shot against the Toronto Raptors) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cory Joseph gets shifty and drains step-back jumper

videos.description: Cade Cunningham lasers a dime to Hamidou Diallo who cuts to the basket for the easy lay-in.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham makes a sweet dime) 2022/01/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham serves up a dime to Hamidou Diallo for the bucket
